column5: Well, I went fishing today with a new fishing buddy, actually a new neighbour in our condo, and whilst standing in the river suffering from heavy rod anxiety decided the Cumara had to happen. So after we got home I scurried over to the Fishing Store and picked up the Cumara .... oh, and it seemed a shame to put any of those heavy reels I have on such a nice light rod, sooooooo ...    That's a little bitty Stradic (the darned kid wouldn't sell his) with 14# braid on a 7'2" Medium weight Extra Fast action Cumara.  And here's my new fishing buddy Lloyd. For you old farts who remember the Mercy Brothers, a country kinda group, that's the drummer brother.    So all in all that's a pretty good day. New friend, new rod and new reel. No fish though.  JF
ur gonna be VERY happy with that combo john!
I sure hope so. Gonna try it out tomorrow.  JF
Well, you can show me what it's all for when I come to visit.  JF
New rod, new reel and a new friend, you're living the good life John.
Yup, although a few fish would be nice.  JF
wow how does it feel to cast air?
I'll find out in the morning, but without water it sure feels light.  JF
